title: Street Legal font ID
content:
I'm looking for a font supposedly called Dogbone, used on the attached CD sleeve for the title "Thunderdome". Does anybody know where to get this font, or can anybody verify the name of the font used? Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110809061713im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Thunderdome_3889.jpg)
author: petterfe
